Grape is a chat application for teams. W: Grape is a chat application for teams. We help you to make your team communication more efficient, productive and fun.
If you haven't used Grape already, we re: If you haven't used Grape already, we recommend you to take our 90 seconds tutorial.
Search appointments, files and more from: Search appointments, files and more from service integrations (like Google Apps or Exchange) or browse the web (e.g. GIFs).
Chat rooms can be public or private and: Chat rooms can be public or private and can be based on projects, topics (e.g. daily lunch) or your departments (e.g. marketing).
Start quickly private conversations with: Start quickly private conversations with your colleagues - even if they haven’t joined Grape yet.
Search conversations, browse your mentio: Search conversations, browse your mentions or view shared files - these handy helpers make your life a lot easier.
